items.title: Collaborative Task Management
items.description: Enable users to create, assign, and track tasks within a team environment across supported platforms.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee
Team members can view all tasks assigned to them and their team
Tasks can be updated with status changes (e.g., To Do, In Progress, Done)
Changes to tasks are visible to all team members in real-time
Feature is accessible on both web and mobile platforms
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task updates should propagate to all clients within 2 seconds
Mobile and web clients should have consistent UI/UX

notes: Feedback was unclear ('smbkj'), so assumptions were made to enhance clarity by specifying platform support and ensuring cross-platform consistency.
